column4: so can anybody help me out regarding linking my ubuntu laptop to a friends Windows Home Server??
clarify what you mean by 'linking'
via internet
as he lives a few many miles away from me, and we share documents and such
try to be a little bit more specific by what you want to Do  with a 'link' that term means veyr little.
He could use winscp to access files on your machine if you wanted.
ok i wana connect to his home server, for specific files, and if need be, use it as storage, is that possible???

proberly. but ive never done it that way. You may to ask in #windows for what service to use on windows to set that up. You dont want to do 'samba' over the internet without a ssh tunnle, or vpn proberly
ok so what would i need for a ssh tunnel then software wise, on my end of the link???
no idea really. i dont do windows -> linux stuff like that. except on a local lan.
wanting to stream video files? he could install 'orb' on his windows box then you could watch videos from anywhere. :0
i plyg in my mouse in my laptop and it works
hmm mine hasnt
and what do i look for??
any messages at teh bottom qwhen you plug it in
how do i pastebin summat from terminal??
command wise?
pastebinit command
i cant get my usb wifi dongle sorted in lucid... n e ideas?
ive never owned a usb-wifi thang.
find its exact name/brand - check forums  is about all i can suggest
ok buddy np man ill get on the rampage asap :P
